name: Customer.io Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow on a Customer.io update (Beta)
natural_language_description: 这是 Customer.io Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow on a Customer.io update (Beta)

events.name: events
events.description: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
